name: CreateNewAsset
description:
Create a new asset in Freshservice.

Use this tool to add a new asset to the Freshservice system. Ideal for tracking and managing assets efficiently.

parameters.name: asset_details
parameters.description: JSON containing all details about the asset, including "id", "display_id", "name", "description", "asset_type_id", "impact", "author_type", "usage_type", "asset_tag", "user_id", "department_id", "location_id", "agent_id", "group_id", "assigned_on", "created_at", "updated_at", and "type_fields".

display_id.description: display id of the asset that is used for all operations

usage_type.description: Usage type of the asset  (accepted values are 'permanent' & 'loaner')

group_id.description: Managed by group of the asset

assigned_on.description: Date and time when the asset was assigned

created_at.description: Timestamp at which the asset was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp at which the asset was last modified

type_fields.description: Fields specific to every asset type (Every asset will have default base fields and type specific fields)

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.
